li.label: Gale Strike
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} strikes with the force of a howling gale, piercing through defenses with the power of wind. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks are swift and unstoppable, cutting through enemies with ease.

li.label: Hurricane Dash
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves like a whirlwind, striking with the speed of a hurricane. {PAWN_pronoun} leaves destruction in {PAWN_possessive} wake, evading attacks with lightning-fast reflexes.

li.label: Tempestuous Guide
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} radiates the power of a storm, compelling even the wildest creatures to follow {PAWN_possessive} command. {PAWN_pronoun} bends the will of beasts with the strength and dominance of a raging tempest.

li.label: Howling Endurance
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} endures hardship like the relentless winds, pressing on no matter the adversity. {PAWN_pronoun} is unshaken, weathering pain and fatigue like a storm that refuses to dissipate.

li.label: Storm's Barrier
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} thrives in the chaos of battle, unshaken by filth or toxins. {PAWN_pronoun} remains impervious, like a storm that sweeps everything aside, leaving no trace of harm.

li.label: Tempest Chef
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} harnesses wind's power to create meals with unmatched speed and efficiency. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures every meal is perfectly crafted, nourishing allies with the swiftness of a storm.

li.label: Whirlwind's Gaze
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has a magnetic presence, like the pull of a powerful gust. {PAWN_pronoun}'s aura ignites loyalty and inspiration in others, leading them like the wind carries seeds to new lands.

li.label: Breeze's Caress
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heals with the gentle touch of a breeze, bringing swift relief to the wounded. {PAWN_pronoun} uses wind's calming power to ensure recovery, never allowing an ally to fall to death's cold grasp.

li.label: Gale's Orchard
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} understands the winds of change and renewal, nurturing the land like a gentle breeze. Wherever {PAWN_pronoun} goes, the land flourishes, bringing forth new growth and abundance.
